ALREADY_EXISTS.name: User already exists
ALREADY_EXISTS.description: User already exists. Try another username

SAVE_LOCAL.name: Error creating account
SAVE_LOCAL.description: Failed to create user in local database

SAVE_LABELS.name: Error creating account
SAVE_LABELS.description: Failed to create labels in local database

SAVE_OWN_CONTACT.name: Error creating account
SAVE_OWN_CONTACT.description: Failed to save own contact in local database

WRONG_CREDENTIALS.name: Wrong credentials
WRONG_CREDENTIALS.description: Incorrect username or password. Check credentials and try again.

LOGIN_FAILED.name: Login error
LOGIN_FAILED.description:
An error occurred while login. Please try again.
Code:

TOO_MANY_DEVICES.name: Too many devices
TOO_MANY_DEVICES.description:
You already have too many active devices. 
From one of your trusted devices remove some inactive device and try again. If you can't access any of your trusted devices, contact support

TOO_MANY_REQUESTS.name: Too many requests
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS.description:
Too many consecutive attempts.
Please try again in

UNAUTHORIZED.name: Encrypting error
UNAUTHORIZED.description:
An error occurred in your request.
Please try again

ENCRYPTING.name: Encrypting error
ENCRYPTING.description:
An error occurred while encrypting message.
Code:

NON_EXISTING_USERS.name: Non existing users
NON_EXISTING_USERS.description:
One or more users doesn't exists.
Check the recipients and try again

UPLOAD_FAILED.name: Upload failed
UPLOAD_FAILED.description:
An error occurred while uploading file.
Please try again

PENDING_FILES.name: Pending files
PENDING_FILES.description: You have uploading or failed files. Please check your files and try again

TOO_MANY_RECIPIENTS.name: Too many recipients
TOO_MANY_RECIPIENTS.description:
Your emails can only contain until 300 recipients.
Please verify and try again.

UNKNOWN.name: Error
UNKNOWN.description:
An error occurred while processing your request.
Code:

description.prefix: The email has surpassed the attachment limit of

PRINTING_ERROR.name: Printing Error
PRINTING_ERROR.description: Failed to print the document. Please try again

SOURCE_ERROR.name: Email Source Error
SOURCE_ERROR.description: Failed to show email source. Please try again

error.name: Updater Error
error.description:
An error occurred while downloading the update. 
Try again later

notAvailable.name: No Update Available
notAvailable.description: You're on the latest version of Criptext

availableManual.name: Update Available
availableManual.description: A new version of Criptext is available. Would you like to download it now?

availableAuto.title: A new version of Criptext is available!
availableAuto.subtitle: Click here to download or dismiss to update later

downloading.title: Downloading update
downloading.subtitle: When it's ready we will notify you

alreadyDownloading.title: Downloading update
alreadyDownloading.subtitle: An update is currently being downloaded

downloaded.title: Install Update
downloaded.subtitle: Update download complete. Criptext will restart and update immediately

closeWarning.title: Warning
closeWarning.message: You are closing a message that has not been sent
closeWarning.detail: To save the message, click on 'Save as Draft'. The message will be saved on your Drafts folder
